text:
e="preserve">Ranjit Chowdhry (19 September 1955 – 15 April 2020) was an Indian actor. He was best known for his roles in television and theatre. He appeared in two episodes of "The Office" as Vikram. He also starred as Dr. Gudat in "Prison Break", Dr. Gupta in "Last Holiday" and as Sabhi in "Baton Baton Mein".
Chowdhry was born in Mumbai. He died at a hospital in Mumbai from gastrointestinal bleeding on 15 April 2020, aged 64.
